featured.text: According to Frances Darwin, founder of Henna Heals, the number of artists now involved in the project across Canada and the US has grown to over 150.

definition.zh_def: 達爾文，英國自然學家，以其進化論和自然選擇理論而聞名。
definition.en_def: Darwin, a British naturalist known for his theory of evolution and natural selection.
definition.example: Charles Darwin developed his theory of evolution during his voyage on the HMS Beagle.
